144.content:
The Normandy had just finished docking at the Citadel after finishing a series of missions. After all the hard work, the entire crew was glad for some free time, being able to relax for a bit and enjoy some down time. Most of the crew left the ship for some leisure time, while others decided to just relax and take it easy.

Miranda Lawson walked into her quarters, the door sliding shut behind her as the five foot ten woman headed over to her bed. She felt exhausted, both physically and mentally, as she sat down, her long, black hair bouncing against her shoulders. Ultimately, she was relived that her sister was finally safe from her father. She fell back on the bed, feeling grateful to Commander Shepard, glad that all the decisions she made which not only helped lead to Oriana’s safety, but also the end of her father.

Normally she would have left the cramped spaces inside the Normandy so she could enjoy several drinks. But the last mission left her feeling drained, both physically and mentally. So the idea of just lounging around in her quarters just sounded very appealing to her at the moment.

As Miranda was staring at the ceiling, still replaying all of the events in her head, she began to feel an odd sensation throughout her entire body. It wasn’t painful, nor was it even uncomfortable. If anything, it felt good to her. Like the first stretch one does in the morning, right after waking up. She sat up, a bit confused about what was going on. She knew that what she was feeling couldn’t be normal. She could actually feel the material of her bodysuit shifting along her skin, especially at her breasts and ass. Not to mention her boots, as her toes were starting to feel a bit cramped for some reason.

“I better not be getting sick,” Miranda said as she held her head. She could still feel the odd sensation throughout her body. She tried to shake it off, but the feeling persisted, as though it is trying to make itself known to her.

choices: Jack finally gets word of what's been happening (or someone else does)
14411112.content:
Commander Shepard arrived back to the docked Normandy after receiving a call from Joker informing her that Miranda was growing out of the Normandy. After asking Joker to repeat that report, as Shepard could hardly believe it herself the first time; the Commander came to a determination to diffuse this situation as peacefully as possible. Before even seeing the damage herself, Shepard saw the enormous Cerberus XO, clutching her breasts, obviously leaving nothing to the imagination besides the hidden areola, smiling awkwardly down at the shocked onlookers.

C-Sec couldn't make much of the situation, dumbfounded themselves at what was happening, until one captain, afraid of the giant, busty woman, ordered the rest of C-Sec to prepare to fire their weapons at the intimidating giantess.

Concerned for her XO, Shepard rushed to the front of the crowd, placing herself between them and Miranda, still stuck in the hull of what remained of the Normandy. "STOP!" Shepard placed her hand before one of C-Sec's rifles. "I'm Commander Jane Shepard, Spectre of the Citadel Council. This isn't some monster attacking the Citadel. Her name is Miranda and she is with me."

The Turian captain of C-Sec looked around, still uneasy about the whole situation, but a Spectre's credentials was good enough for him. And after thinking about it, the giantess wasn't exactly rampaging around, destroying or maiming anything else. "Spectre Shepard" the captain saluted Shepard, "I will recall C-Sec, and relinquish authority here to you." The Turian blushed, looking back up at Miranda, then back to Shepard before turning around.

With a potential violent incident peacefully resolved, Shepard let out a hefty sigh of relief, before turning to face Miranda, still smiling as embarrassed as possible. The Cerberus operative gave only an awkward wave of her enormous hand, "Hi Shepard, allow me to explain. I started growing, and I don't know why."

Shepard looked around Miranda, bits and pieces of the Normandy falling off, Miranda ripping a hole as gigantic as she was. Everything was a giant mess. "I'll have to call in a little help..." Shepard let out, still weirded out by this entire bizarre event
14411112.title: Shepard diffuses the situation

144111121.content:
After several hours of hard work and heavy machinery to free Miranda from the Normandy, Miranda was sitting in the docking bay. Her breasts and ass swelled to immense proportions. Her breasts covered her thighs as she knelt, and her ass stuck way out. The docking bay was closed down to anyone who did not need to be there, allowing Miranda some privacy as there was nothing big enough to maintain her modesty.

Miranda had to endure several hours of testing, as doctors were trying to ascertain the reason for her enormous growth and what triggered it. Being bombarded with questions about her condition as they try to narrow it down.

The following day, one of the doctors was talking to Miranda from a platform, so as to talk to her face to face. The five foot six blonde was looking down at the test results from behind her square frame glasses, her thick hair reaching all the way down to her ankles.

“Hello Miranda, I am Dr. Selness,” she began. “First of all, I am assuming that you want to know your current size, correct?”

“I would like to, yes,” Miranda replied.

“Well,” Dr. Selness continued, ”You have grown from a height of five foot ten to an impressive, and unprecedented, height of thirty-six feet and ten inches.” Miranda smiled slightly as she heard the answer. “Which is about a five hundred and thirty-one percent increase in height.”

Miranda shifted a bit as she waited to hear the other measurements.

“Your breasts now measure thirty-one feet and ten inches. While your, lets just call them hips, are twenty-nine feet and ten inches.”

Miranda looked down at herself, enjoying her new figure. “Did you figure out what caused me to grow like this.”

“Well,” the doctor started, “We do have a couple working theories on that. You said that you were essentially genetically engineered by your father, correct?”

“Yes,” Miranda replied.

“From your blood work, it seemed as though your genetic coding had a flaw in it, probably from how your father handled your genetics. So this could have either occurred naturally, or, our alternative theory is that your existing genes were relatively stable, and an environmental trigger was the culprit that interacted with a faulty gene set.”

Miranda grinned, finding the irony in the perfection her father had tried to create. But her face suddenly changed drastically as a new realization hit her.

“Dr. Selness, could this growth have been prevented if it was known about beforehand?”

“I suppose so, why?”

Miranda’s mind was racing, thinking about how her sister was trying to lead a normal life. “Go get Commander Shepard, and tell her to find my sister. I think she may suffer the same condition as me.”
144111121.title: Genetic testing

info.brief_description: I felt that it was time for a mass effect expansion and growth story
info.description:
This story is for fans of mass effect who want to see the women grow into giantess's or have their breasts get larger.

RULES

1. No male growth

2.No guy on guy but girl on girl is fine

3. Ass and belly expansion is fine but stick to growth or breast expansion for most of it

4. No killing of main characters

All female characters from all games can be used.
